content: Can anyone provide the spec that we are going by for the profiles. Ie: i want to read data from a payer. I don't know where the spec is that was implemented by them. Example what should be in the EOB etc.

You can also find an advance version of the STU Update (v1.1.0) here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/branches/v1.1.0/
The changes in this version have been approved by the HL7 Financial Management WG and will be going through a peer review process shortly.
